metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20843 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In libexpat in Expat before 2.2.7, XML input including XML names thatcontain a large number of colons could make the XML parser consume a highamount of RAM and CPU resources while processing (enough to be usable fordenial-of-service attacks).

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
